exercises.name: Find even or odd and maximum in list.
exercises.text: Write a program that takes numbers of a list and firstly outputs if the number is even or odd and afterwards whether it is the current maximum.

exercises.name: Guessing game.
exercises.text: First we set a guess numbe (in this case it is set to 7) and a list of input values and checks for this list of guesses if each value matches the guess number. It also gives feedback if the input is too low or too high and finishes when the value -1 is found in the list of inputs.

exercises.name: Even or odd.
exercises.text: Report wether an input number is even or odd.

exercises.name: Reverse word and wordlist.
exercises.text: Given an array of words which make up a sentence, generate and print out the comma seperated words as a string in reverse order and each word reversed.
